dialogue-content.speaker: 医生
dialogue-content.sentence: 您好，我是您的辅诊医生，需要询问几个问题，才能更好的评估孩子情况，您还在吗？
dialogue-content.label: OOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO

dialogue-content.speaker: 患者
dialogue-content.sentence: 我应该去医院给孩子打针吗
dialogue-content.label: OOOOOOOOOOOO

dialogue-content.speaker: 医生
dialogue-content.sentence: 宝宝现在体温多少
dialogue-content.label: OOOOOOOO

dialogue-content.speaker: 患者
dialogue-content.sentence: 两点多吃的退烧药现在不发烧了
dialogue-content.label: OOOOOOOOOOOBIO

dialogue-content.speaker: 医生
dialogue-content.sentence: 宝宝咳嗽厉害吗？影响睡眠吗
dialogue-content.label: OOBIOOOOOOOOO

dialogue-content.speaker: 医生
dialogue-content.sentence: 嗓子哑吗？
dialogue-content.label: BIIOO

dialogue-content.speaker: 患者
dialogue-content.sentence: 上午十点多发烧了吃药了
dialogue-content.label: OOOOOOBOOOO

dialogue-content.speaker: 患者
dialogue-content.sentence: 咳嗽厉害有痰，不是一直咳嗽
dialogue-content.label: BIOOBIOOOOOBI

dialogue-content.speaker: 患者
dialogue-content.sentence: 嗓子不哑
dialogue-content.label: BIII

dialogue-content.speaker: 医生
dialogue-content.sentence: 嗯
dialogue-content.label: O

dialogue-content.speaker: 医生
dialogue-content.sentence: 最好带宝宝去公立医院儿科查一下血常规看看
dialogue-content.label: OOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO

dialogue-content.speaker: 医生
dialogue-content.sentence: 听诊肺部看看有没有肺炎
dialogue-content.label: OOOOOOOOOBI

dialogue-content.speaker: 患者
dialogue-content.sentence: 前两天查血常规了白血胞两万我才给打的针
dialogue-content.label: OOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO

dialogue-content.speaker: 医生
dialogue-content.sentence: 嗯
dialogue-content.label: O

dialogue-content.speaker: 患者
dialogue-content.sentence: 今天早上发的烧，跟我昨晚洗澡有关系吗
dialogue-content.label: OOOOOOBOOOOOOOOOOO

dialogue-content.speaker: 医生
dialogue-content.sentence: 宝宝又出现发热，咳嗽加重可能是又感染了
dialogue-content.label: OOOOOBIOBIOOOOOOOOO

dialogue-content.speaker: 医生
dialogue-content.sentence: 这个不好说
dialogue-content.label: OOOOO

dialogue-content.speaker: 患者
dialogue-content.sentence: 今天晚上看看不行明天就得去医院了
dialogue-content.label: OOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO

dialogue-content.speaker: 医生
dialogue-content.sentence: 血常规三天以上就可以复查
dialogue-content.label: OOOOOOOOOOOO

dialogue-content.speaker: 医生
dialogue-content.sentence: 嗯嗯勤量体温
dialogue-content.label: OOOOOO

dialogue-content.speaker: 医生
dialogue-content.sentence: 不到38.5不用吃退热药
dialogue-content.label: OOOOOOOOOOOO

dialogue-content.speaker: 医生
dialogue-content.sentence: 退热药一般不用来预防发热哦
dialogue-content.label: OOOOOOOOOOBIO

dialogue-content.speaker: 患者
dialogue-content.sentence: 哦哦知道了，孩子打针太遭罪了
dialogue-content.label: OOOOOOOOOOOOOO

dialogue-content.speaker: 医生
dialogue-content.sentence: 嗯
dialogue-content.label: O

dialogue-content.speaker: 医生
dialogue-content.sentence: 退热药滥用容易引起肝肾损害还有体温过低
dialogue-content.label: OOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO

dialogue-content.speaker: 患者
dialogue-content.sentence: 嗯知道了谢谢
dialogue-content.label: OOOOOO

dialogue-content.speaker: 医生
dialogue-content.sentence: 不超过38.5，可以给宝贝少盖一点散热，给宝贝多喝水，宝宝手脚热的话用温水擦一下眉头脖子还有腋窝，十分钟左右有助退热
dialogue-content.label: OOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO

dialogue-content.speaker: 医生
dialogue-content.sentence: 不客气
dialogue-content.label: OOO

dialogue-content.speaker: 医生
dialogue-content.sentence: 祝宝宝早日康复
dialogue-content.label: OOOOOOO
